com.devisubox.dvws.WebSocket

Class DevisuboxWebSocketSecure

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseWebSocketHandler
      • com.devisubox.dvws.WebSocket.DevisuboxWebSocket
        • com.devisubox.dvws.WebSocket.DevisuboxWebSocketSecure

  • public class DevisuboxWebSocketSecure
extends DevisuboxWebSocket
    The Devisubox WebSocket server class, with an SSL configuration for a secure HTTP handshake.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.io.File keyPassFile
